title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING THE SANGGUNIANG BARANGAY OF BAMBANG ORDINANCE NO. 029, SERIES OF 2025, DATED SEPTEMBER 9, 2025 ENTITLED, ‚ÄùAN ORDINANCE ESTABLISHING THE BARANGAY MATERIAL RECOVERY FACILITY (MRF) OF BARANGAY BAMBANG, LOS BANOS, LAGUNA AND PROVIDING FUNDS FOR ITS OPERATION AND MANAGEMENT.
